lead_paragraph: Gambian leader Yahya Jammeh accused West African regional body ECOWAS of declaring war, after it said it was putting forces on alert in case he refused to step down at the end of his mandate this month.
snippet: Gambian leader Yahya Jammeh accused West African regional body ECOWAS of declaring war, after it said it was putting forces on alert in case he refused to step down at the end of his mandate this month....

headline.main: Gambia Leader Accuses West African Bloc of Declaring War
headline.print_headline: Gambia Leader Accuses West African Bloc of Declaring War
